biotools.summary: VirHEAT tool generates multi-sample variant-frequency plots from SnpEff-annotated viral variant lists.  The tool provides a condensed look at variant frequencies after mapping  raw reads to a viral/bacterial reference genome and compares multiple vcf files at the same time.

galaxy.summary: generates a heatmap of allele frequencies from vcf files
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: VirHEAT tool generates multi-sample variant-frequency plots from SnpEff-annotated viral variant lists.  The tool provides a condensed look at variant frequencies after mapping  raw reads to a viral/bacterial reference genome and compares multiple vcf files at the same time.
